import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const features = [ { name: 'AI-Powered Document Generation', description: 'Generate legal documents like NDAs, employment contracts, and lease agreements in seconds using advanced AI.', icon: ( ), link: '/document-generator' }, { name: 'Smart Contract Review', description: 'Analyze contracts for legal risks, best practices, and get expert recommendations.', icon: ( ), link: '/contract-reviewer' }, { name: 'DAO Creation', description: 'Create and manage decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) with custom governance rules.', icon: ( ), link: '/dao-creator' }, { name: 'Legal Chatbot', description: 'Get instant legal advice and information through our conversational AI chatbot.', icon: ( ), link: '/legal-chatbot' }, ]; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated, loading } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(window.innerWidth < 768); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { setIsMobile(window.innerWidth < 768); }; window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); return () => window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }, []); useEffect(() => { if (!loading) { if (isAuthenticated) { navigate('/dashboard'); } } }, [isAuthenticated, loading, navigate]); if (loading) { return (

Powerful Features

Everything you need for legal work

DigiLex combines AI and legal expertise to provide you with powerful tools for document generation, contract review, and legal guidance.

{/* About Us section */}

About Us

DigiLex was born from the vision of two engineering sophomores who dreamed of democratizing legal expertise. What began as a late-night conversation in a university dorm room blossomed into a revolutionary platform that bridges the gap between complex legal systems and everyday users.

United by their passion for technology and justice, these founders assembled a team of legal experts, AI specialists, and designers to create an unprecedented innovation. DigiLex represents their belief that quality legal assistance shouldn't be a privilege for the few, but accessible to all.

Today, DigiLex continues to grow, guided by the original vision of its founders: to empower individuals and businesses with the legal tools they need to thrive in an increasingly complex world.
